Summary: entered, round blue light blinked, exited upward then dissappeared
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Show Low
There were no other sightings in Show Low on or around January 18th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home east on 60 an object appeared to the right side of the highway across from the airport. I was driving with my 7 year old grandson in front daughter, and infant in back seat. I observed an object sort of like stream in and thought it was a low flying plane getting ready to land at airport. There was a blue round light on the bottom of object. The blue light flashed once then seemed to travel at a slant then vanished, all very quickly. I turned to my daughter and asked if she saw that! She said, saw what? My grandson quickly said I did! what was that? I asked what did you see? He said he saw it come in and the blue light blinked, left up and was gone. I asked him to draw me a picture when we got home, then told him that I think we just saw a ufo. He asked what a ufo is. I told them it's called an unidentified flying object, something we can't explain. When we got home he drew what he saw and it corresponded with what I had witnessed, but he seemed to see more detail than me in his drawing.
